item.description:
Diva Lounge is back again bringing you one of Boston's hottest Bollywood/Bhangra party this Diwali!

You don't want to miss the Diwali Dhamaka Party 2010 - A night with India's #1 Celebrity DJ Nawed!

Over 300+ people expected! This is one of Bostons's Biggest Diwali Party of the year!!

On Nov 4th, on the occasion of Diwali Shahrukh Khans Official DJ Nawed is coming all the way from Mumbai to rock Boston for One Night Only --

MAIN DJ SET BY NAWED SPINNING THE HOTTEST (BOLLYWOOD, BHANGRA, REMIX'S) -- Opening Set by DJ Sunny, the top dj in Boston, playing the hottest bollywood, bhangra

BELLY DANCERS PREFORMING LIVE!** LIVE DHOL PLAYER!**

YOU DONT WANT TO MISS THIS!! CHECK OUT NAWED PREFORMING AT HIS BEST! http://www.youtube.co.... http://www.youtube.co.... http://www.youtube.co....

Hightlights:

21+ DRESS TO IMPRESS

COmplimentary Hors d'oeuvre

Porfessional Photographer

Drinkspecials all night

kitchen open till 12! enjoy some savory indian tapas and the new menu!

www.diwalidhamaka2011.eventbrite.com
item.name: DIWALI DHAMAKA BOLLYWOOD NIGHT WITH DJ NAWED
